text:
niqyuta#M ca praqyutaqM cArbu#daM caq nya#rbudaM ca samuqdraScaq maddhyaqM cAnta#Sca parAqd^^rdhaScEqmA mE# agnaq iShTa#kA dhEqnava#H santu ShaqShThiH saqhasra#maqyutaq-makShI#yamANA RutaqsthA stha#rtAqvRudhO# GRutaqScutO# madhuqScutaq Urja#svatIH svadhAqvinIqstA mE# agnaq iShTa#kA dhEqnava#H santu viqrAjOq nAma# 
kAmaqduGA# aqmutrAqmuShmi#n ~MlOqkE || 32
(savra#tA - ruqdrANA# - maqyuta#~jcaq - pa~jca#catvAri(gm)Sacca) (A11)
